rooms.name: Lobby / Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Vastu alignment ensuring positive energy flow, acting as an entry transition.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with a private balcony aligned to the north for positive energies, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with adequate natural light and ventilation, aligning to the west as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another well-ventilated bedroom, positioned in the east to balance energy distribution.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large open-plan living area with Vastu-aligned seating arrangements and plenty of natural light from east and south.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dining space designed for family gatherings with a north-facing outlook to promote positivity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern appliances, located in the northeast section for positive energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space designed for quiet reading, placed in the southeast to benefit from natural light while minimizing distractions.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A state-of-the-art gym with specialized equipment, positioned in the west to allow for proper ventilation and privacy.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: An outdoor swimming pool with a relaxing deck and sunbathing space, designed to enhance relaxation while adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility
rooms.description: Essential storage space for tools and supplies, placed in the northwest to maintain balance as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A guest bathroom designed for convenience, following Vastu guidelines by aligning the fixtures to support positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bathroom with privacy and luxury, aligned to the north for a refreshing ambience.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Primary entry door ensuring ease of access, aligned in the east for a positive welcome as per Vastu.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Standard windows placed to allow natural light and ventilation throughout the house, positioned strategically in all rooms.

openings.name: Swing Door
openings.description: Interior swing door for connecting living spaces efficiently while adhering to Vastu flow.
openings.location: Between Living Room and Dining Room
